ValidationRule.description: This validation rule fires when the funding decision is "approved" and someone tries to close the case with the blank value of the funding expiry date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EDRD', ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Approved"), ISBLANK(EDRD_MOHFunding_Expiry_Date__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'MOH Review'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Funding Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Funding Denied')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Funding Decision is "Approved", then the case cannot be closed with the blank values of Funding Expiry Date.
